website_summaries.verdict: A portable cooler that looks like a bag, this option pre-cools in a short period of time so you can quickly get on the road.
pros: A cooler and a warmer in one, it can chill contents to 48 degrees Fahrenheit or warm up contents to 140 degrees Fahrenheit
Lightweight and very portable, it carries like a bag
cons: Does not come with an AC adapter
Some customers say this option is too small

customer_reviews.title: Temperature runs under 40 degrees.
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed the bag and took it on the first test run. I was able to chill a bottle and a can in a pretty short period of time (under an hour). Had it running for a few hours now with a thermometer in the bag. Runs under 40 degrees Fahrenheit, and as low as 32 degrees. Two thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Congeniality

customer_reviews.title: Great for car trips!
customer_reviews.text: Great device for long car trips! Very quiet while sitting on back seat. Toured the hot, dry Western US and had cool soda and water all day. Only warning is that the materials have to be COLD when you put them in the bag. The cooler does not have the power to cool down warm liquids effectively. Best plan is to put liquids in motel fridge overnight each night. BTW, it is easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a life saver- literally. I recently moved from Seattle to Texas and had to drive due to my dog's medical condition. I was worried about transporting his insulin because it has to stay refrigerated but this cooler took all that stress away. Worked great and kept his insulin cold during those 9-10 hours drive days. Was hesitant to buy at first because of the price, but so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Sanson

customer_reviews.title: Impressive cooling in a quick manner
customer_reviews.text: Impressive. I have tried similar products in the past but never achieved the cooling level I was seeking. This bag not only achieved 40 degrees but did so very quickly.....I didn't time it but would agree with the manual that it was about 20 minutes. That was in the car. Later in the day I took the bag into my home and while on the mains it achived a level of 36 degrees on the surface of the foil inner liner. I had planned to use this to keep my prescription cool on hot July/August days while out on a day trip. Now I will take in car on daily basis to use with daily shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Foxdown

customer_reviews.title: Low quality, dangerous product.
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I got it, I plugged it in to test it and the power connector broke. The socket in the back is held together with two extremely short screws, and one of them just popped out of the hole. I tried to screw it back in, but it appears the plastic is stripped. Terrible quality and dangerous construction.
customer_reviews.author: Fayt Quicksilver

customer_reviews.title: Plug In port broke
customer_reviews.text: KepUt bottled water cool and I was quite happy with it. It worked great with the AC adapter for the pool as well. BUT!!! The bracket that holds the plug is cheaply made. I thought a screw came loose, so I took it apart to find a broken plastic bracket. Have had passed return daTVte, so I imagine I am stuck with it and will trash it. Be extremely careful that nothing comes in contact with the plug in. So sad here. COMPANY CONTACTED IMMEDIATELY. Replacement on the way. Changed previous rating to 5 stars for excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hubans

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine.. 2 days ahead of Irma. First off, it is small. Second The zipper doesn't work right. It snags over the material near the end. Huge disappointment. Don't know if it works. If the hurricane wasn't coming on Sunday I would send it back now.
customer_reviews.author: Out There

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect for packing away for a trip on a plane
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for packing away for a trip on a plane. We are using it for medication and drinks. I have tested this bag and it has been cooling inside my home and reached 50 degrees inside the bag after being plugged into a 110 outlet for 24 hours. The temperature is 72 degrees in my home. The written description states it will cool to 48 degrees, but the picture has text that states 45 degrees. I wish that they would state exactly what it cools to. I have not used the heating element yet.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This a great soft electric car cooler and warmer bag. I bought this bag for the swim meets and family road trips passing multiple states. The bag keeps food and beverages cool without ice. The bag is waterproof so you can even pack healthy snacks like fruit and yogurt. Overall this is a great product with some improvement areas. For example it could offer a bigger size for big families, since the current size is for small families.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Could Use Improvements
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It cools really well and heats really well. Cons: The switch to change between hot and cool can easily be bumped en route. (Thus the reason we knew the heating worked.) Also the plug-in part popped off the screws first trip. (Shown in picture.) Suggestions for improvement: the hot/cool switch should have a cover to avoid accidental switching between desired temperatures. Secure plug-in with slightly longer screws and washers.
customer_reviews.author: Kiyoos

customer_reviews.title: CHEAP/ DEFECTIVE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cooler and the cooler/heater switch was broken. I sent it back and ordered a new one because it had such good reviews. The second one I received was also defective. It made some loud clanging noise when it was on. The screws were stripped and hitting against the fan. VERY disappointed. Why does this item have good reviews. Terrible quality. Don't waste your time on this one.
customer_reviews.author: conegg

customer_reviews.title: falls apart after one use!
customer_reviews.text: The attachment that holds the cooling fan came apart and the electrical plug is loose. I only used it one time and can see it will not last long as you can not screw it in properly. Very poor quality, I liked the size and portability of the unit, just wish it was built better.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Good company to work with
customer_reviews.text: I used this cooler sparingly for 2 months and then it died. I have contacted the company but received nothing back from them. I don't like putting up negative reviews but I have no other way to reach out to them It may have been a fluke, I liked the product a lot but I'm surprised that they have nothing to say about it For some reason,I just wasn't receiving their replies. They saw this and are immediately sending me a replacement. Turns out they are a very good company!
customer_reviews.author: P. Michael Shea-Zackin

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken cord
customer_reviews.text: The cord that came with it was broken on the red end that plugs in the cigarette lighter. Can't use it without power. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Stocking

customer_reviews.title: This may be standard or just a glitch in product I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Zipper sticks and then will not zip at all unless I pull zipper back and zip again. Was very frustrating while traveling and trying to get out the cheeses and meats.
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo B.

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely keep your stuff cool.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the pferformance of this little cooler. Usd it on a 8 day trip. It kept drinks cooler than the minifridge in the hotel room. Worked great the whole time and you can’t beat the light weight. Much easier to carry than a regular cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick McMichael

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for a trip to keep medicines cool instead of blue ice since it was a four ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a trip to keep medicines cool instead of blue ice since it was a four day trip. It quit working one day into the trip. Since I was still on my trip when the return by date expired now I am stuck with a non-electrical cooler, and defective product. The bag was well built but the electrical sucks.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Tetter

customer_reviews.title: Enjoy the cold food on the road.
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed with this car cooler. It looks small but it can hold up 2 person's food and drinks. Light, so easy to take it around, just place it in front of passenger seat for easier access. Pre-cold the drinks before the go, just throw them into the cooler, always enjoy fresh cold drinks on the road. Never 'drop by' the store for cold drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Cold is plenty cold!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, but I really love this bag! It keeps my groceries cold for days, and I keep it in the kitchen for that purpose. It has been a real life saver. I just ordered my second one, and I can hardly wait for it to get here.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Freda Ferd

customer_reviews.title: Buy, but recommend a diy prior to first use
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second when returned the first one. It does keep things cool but it does take a while to drop the temp. Overall happy. Only issues is that the connector to where the cord attached is flimsy and will break off. I un reward it and reinforced with lock tight superglue.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Villanueva

customer_reviews.title: Only cools a little.
customer_reviews.text: WHAT A DISAPPOINTMENT. I thought that I could keep milk and salads in here, but it only cooled to about 55 degrees when my hotel room was about 68 degrees. I used a refrigerator thermometer and the temperature was always in the "danger" zone.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Would really love it if they made this in ALL black
customer_reviews.text: My first time buying an electric cooler. Cools quickly. Fairly light at only 3.5 lb. Would really love it if they made this in ALL black!
customer_reviews.author: Patti S.

customer_reviews.title: Lack of Cooling
customer_reviews.text: It needs to run much too long to notice any cooling and the cooling is not significant.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Davis

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cooler
customer_reviews.text: awesome product. I travel/drive a lot so this helped. wished I could adjust how cold it goes since sometimes it doesn't feel cold enough but it still a great product. Mine arrived damaged but the customer support email was quick and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars. It did not keep our food cold or even cool. I have contacted the company, so far no help
customer_reviews.author: afd

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work very well
customer_reviews.text: This cooler was a waste of money - didn't get the job done at all. Sorry I bought it. Oh well . . . . .
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great unit but small for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit. Its quiet and gets cold. Only problem is that its was too small for our needs. To use it to keep soda/water and snacks cold on a road trip it would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Need quality control from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: I found it damaged. The Plug adapter loose and damaged. However; I just received a message from the supplier offering me replacement which shows they care about their customer. I liked their fast response to my complain
customer_reviews.author: Auwad

customer_reviews.title: VERY weak refrigeration
customer_reviews.text: The 50W refrigeration motor is VERY weak, cools things very slowly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Access
customer_reviews.text: Works well to keep lunch and drinks cold. However; leaves puddles on floor board every so often
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very small and it didn't keep things cold. It was so small to have so much space taken up by the motor to keep things cool. The plug was also broken on arrival. I had another plug to use to test the cooler out. My other soft coolers with blue ice do a better job than this item. It has a really nice look otherwise. The zipper was also not so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: batsheva

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my boyfriend who is a truck ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my boyfriend who is a truck driver. He likes it, but he says it drains the battery if he leaves it plugged in for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: 2010yasmin22

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money
customer_reviews.text: Product switch broke two days of vacation open and used on July 3rd broke and spoil food on July 5 on why to Florida and because I brought in may and used in July can not even get it replaced money wasted
customer_reviews.author: Earline Taylor

customer_reviews.title: arrived already broken
customer_reviews.text: My fear with this type of unit was that it would not be durable. On arrival the connector for the power cord was already broken. Fear confirmed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Higgins

customer_reviews.title: In the cooler stays cold for at least five hours afterwards and plug it it’s great would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Great product get stuff very cold In the cooler stays cold for at least five hours afterwards and plug it it’s great would definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Paul Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Cools very well ... Waiting for the new addition with better improvement
customer_reviews.author: Husain

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't keep items cold, would be better just having a bag with ice pack. Used once and probably never again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Dukesherer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received and used my cooler today. The quality is great it kept my food warm all day not sure of the cooling yet but will repost in the months to come.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Runs battery done on truck when not in use left ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs battery done on truck when not in use left over night next morning no start battery run down
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Lewing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and keeps food and drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Crandell

customer_reviews.title: How to return or exchange this
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks I bought it last June 2018 and after 2 months it’s not heating up
customer_reviews.author: Danny de Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Screws stripped
customer_reviews.text: Think it works well. First time I put in the power cord the screws stripped out so going to try a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Wietfeldt

customer_reviews.title: VERY poor european design
customer_reviews.text: VERY poor european design. Power plug socket plunged (fine thread screws in plastic stripped) into housing while plugging cord into socket. It has no bag shape holding inside and it is unbalanced and tips over it won't stay upright.
customer_reviews.author: R. Bever

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't actually cool anything. It just blows air around. The bag won't even keep things cold when you put frozen ice packs in it. I took it on a 2 hour car ride with the ice pack in it and the inside of the bag wasn't that cold
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: On the second use of this cooler it blew the fuse in our car (2018 4-Runner) and upon inspecting the connector it was defective. I would save your money and look at other options. It seems we are stuck with a very small awkward cooler, that was WAY overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: nicole r. orlaineta

customer_reviews.title: For what you pay there no room in reality they're ...
customer_reviews.text: For what you pay there no room in reality they're just barely enough room to put a some drinks in there
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for a road trip to Florida June 27 2018. The plug was damaged during minor movement in the vehicle. It was pushed in and is inoperable. The food was therefore ruined and the unit cannot be reused. Unfortunately I found this to be an inferior item. I stress that no heavy movement was placed on the plug. I do not recommend this item. **Since I reviewed this item I have been in contact with the seller and they have been more than gracious in solving the problem. They are in the process of sending me a replacement cooler, and I am very grateful for their prompt and professional response **
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C

customer_reviews.title: a very good cooling bag for an electric car
customer_reviews.text: The first one that arrived was defective. The machine made a lot of noises. The seller sent a new one no questions asked. This one works fine. I can recommend it
customer_reviews.author: germanlitfan234

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT DOES NOT WORK AS ADVERTISED!!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time I used the bag, everything was nice and cold, I got to my location, unplugged it, I was out of the car for 1 hour 20 min, got back to the car, everything was warm. Tried it one more time. Again everything was cold, unplugged it, I was out of the car for 37 minutes, came back, the bag and my food was warm. Had to throw out my food. Returning product. I DO NOT RECOMMEND. Also, I bought the adapter to use in the house, guess what NO RETURNS!!! SO I AM RETURNING THE COOLER THAT DOES NOT WORK, BUT I'M STUCK WITH THE ADAPTER. SHADY COMPANY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Argus Le Causalyg 12 Volt DC Soft Electric Car Cooler/Warmer Bag, Portable Car Fridge with Thermoelectric System for Camping, Road Trip, Picnic - 18L Capacity
feature_bullets: ▶A Multifunctional Electric Cooler & Warmer - The Thermoelectric System allows cooling and warming system, it can chill contents down to 48°F & warm up contents to 120-140°F. Comes with 74" power cord plugs in any 12V DC receptacle. This storage container keep your items fresh, like milk, juice, snacks, fruit, salad, pizza, cheese, etc.

▶▶20 Cans Massive Capacity - Measuring 13.6"L x 9.25"H x 8.07"W, 4.75 gallon(18L) massive interior size which can hold 20 cans of soda. This portable refrigerator is capable of keeping your food and drinks cool & warm and ready to enjoy at any time.

▶▶▶Insulated Food Grade Material - Premium Food Grade EPE pearl cotton and aluminum foil lining offers great thermal resistance to lock up the temperature, BPA-free, safely use. Maintains temperature for up to 4 hours without power supply.
▶▶▶▶Moving Convenience - Fashion handbag design, only 3.9 lbs, allows for effortless carrying and fits easily into car seats for bulk free travel, ideal for outdoor picnic, BBQs, camping, office etc.
▶▶▶▶▶Warranty - Reliable quality , 1 month free trial, 1 year warranty and 24 hours customer service, fulfilled by Amazon, enjoy a purchase completely risk free.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
